price: 28. Nabii Muusa Nabii Shuqeybik:too edde yabteeh xagana yoh edde cultem yoo kee ku-fanal soltaah kak awqe waynay anu taamal ama namma waktik duudusinnaanih wakti (bacra liggidaa kee tabna liggidak tiik teyna kinnuk), ku- xagana duuduse num akkeyyooh wohuk fulah yol essertam mantu, kaadu nanu ixxicci inneeh sitta elle geyyi hayneemil Yalli nee yableeh sumaaqah nel yaniih nee dacrisah kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَۖ أَيَّمَا ٱلۡأَجَلَيۡنِ قَضَيۡتُ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ عَلَيَّۖ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla dhālika baynī wabaynaka ayyamā al-ajalayni qaḍaytu falā ʿud'wāna ʿalayya wal-lahu ʿalā mā naqūlu wakīlun
